data.title: How Do You Teach Complex Games Without Losing Everyone?
data.content:
I love heavy games, but Iâ€™ve definitely had moments where teaching something like Gaia Project or Ark Nova just made everyoneâ€™s eyes glaze over.

What are your best tips for teaching big or rule-heavy games to a group? Especially when they have mixed experience levels?

Do you start with a theme overview, skip some rules, jump into a mock round, or just read the manual out loud (ğŸ˜¬)? Iâ€™d love to hear your teaching hacks, your fails, or even what not to do.
